title: Bloomberg's Lippert on Emissions Issue With Ford F-150 (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Lippert on Emissions Issue With Ford F-150 (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: John Lippert, Auto reporter for Bloomberg News, on his story "Ford’s Crown Jewel, the F-150, Has a Big Problem After Overhaul," which states that some versions of the truck don't meet goverment emissions mandates.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
